Direction.name: Direction
Direction.description: This IPSO object is used to report the direction indicated by a compass, wind vane, or other directional indicator. The units of measure is plane angle degrees.

Compass_Direction.name: Compass Direction
Compass_Direction.description: This indicates the compass direction of some phenomenon (i.e. direction of travel, wind direction...).

Min_Measured_Value.name: Min Measured Value
Min_Measured_Value.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset.

Max_Measured_Value.name: Max Measured Value
Max_Measured_Value.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset.

Application_Type.name: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

Reset_Min_and_Max_Measured_Values.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
Reset_Min_and_Max_Measured_Values.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value.
